Name: Kruger P-72 Archimedes Emerald
Description:
Manufacturer: Kruger Intergalactic
Focus: Racer

Whether for added security, exploring a system or simply the joy of flying, the Kruger Intergalactic P-72 Archimedes snub craft was designed to deliver exceptional handling and nimble acceleration in a sleek and stylish package.  The Emerald limited edition features a special "lucky" paint job.
DescriptionText: Whether for added security, exploring a system or simply the joy of flying, the Kruger Intergalactic P-72 Archimedes snub craft was designed to deliver exceptional handling and nimble acceleration in a sleek and stylish package. The Emerald limited edition features a special "lucky" paint job.
